item.title: Bootable usb pendrive using cmd - Windows 10
item.description: Bootable usb pendrive using cmd - Windows 10. Open a command prompt as administrator Type C:\Windows\system32> diskpart Type DISKPART> list disk DISKPART> select disk 2 (Select your flash drive by running select disk # (Becareful)) DISKPART> clean DISKPART> create partition primary DISKPART> select partition 1 DISKPART> format fs=ntfs quick DISKPART> active DISKPART> exit
